description: This week, our first place winner on the insightful side is an anonymous reply to a complaint about Biden sinking the ship of the US: Racking up the votes for second place, it’s an anonymous comment about lessons from the Vice Media collapse: That’s the root of 90% of our problems as a nation. Quarter-to-quarter […]
title: Funniest/Most Insightful Comments Of The Week At Techdirt
